tidbits.title: River Gambia
tidbits.description: Gambia is named after the River Gambia, the country's main waterway, which runs through its center and plays a crucial role in its geography and culture.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country embraces cultural diversity, with various ethnic groups coexisting harmoniously, each contributing unique traditions, music, and art.

tidbits.title: Birdwatching Haven
tidbits.description: Gambia is a birdwatcher's paradise, with diverse bird species, especially along the riverbanks and protected areas, attracting bird enthusiasts worldwide.
